body_html:
Hi Mateo, if you check the BUILD at tensorflow/tensorflow/core/kernels/BUILD, you'll see the decode_jpeg_op.cc is excluded from the android filegroup for the following reason documented in the file:

"# Ops which we are currently excluding because they are likely"

"# not used on Android. Those ops also do not compile if included,"

"# unless we add the additional deps they need."

So as suggested from the comment, they don't compile when included. However you could try and remove the decode_jpeg_op from the exclude section and find the dependencies.

body:
Hi Mateo, if you check the BUILD at tensorflow/tensorflow/core/kernels/BUILD, you'll see the decode_jpeg_op.cc is excluded from the android filegroup for the following reason documented in the file: 

"# Ops which we are currently excluding because they are likely"

"# not used on Android. Those ops also do not compile if included,"

"# unless we add the additional deps they need."

So as suggested from the comment, they don't compile when included. However you could try and remove the decode_jpeg_op from the exclude section and find the dependencies.
